WITH RECURSIVE subdepartment AS ( -- non-recursive term SELECT a.menu_no ,a.menu_cd ,a.menu_kind ,a.menu_lvl ,a.menu_nm ,a.prnt_menu_cd ,a.ord ,a.pgm_id ,a.rmk ,a.menu_path ,a.crt_dtm ,a.updt_dtm ,a.menu_cd::text as menu_cd_path FROM tb_cm_menu a where a.prnt_menu_cd is null
UNION ALL
-- recursive term SELECT d.menu_no ,d.menu_cd ,d.menu_kind ,d.menu_lvl ,d.menu_nm ,d.prnt_menu_cd ,d.ord ,d.pgm_id ,d.rmk ,d.menu_path ,d.crt_dtm ,d.updt_dtm ,sd.menu_cd_path ||'>'|| d.menu_cd as menu_cd_path
FROM tb_cm_menu d JOIN subdepartment sd ON (d.prnt_menu_cd = sd.menu_cd) ) select d.menu_no ,d.menu_cd ,d.menu_kind ,d.menu_lvl ,d.menu_nm ,d.prnt_menu_cd ,d.ord ,d.pgm_id ,d.rmk ,d.menu_path ,d.crt_dtm ,d.updt_dtm ,d.menu_cd_path from subdepartment d where 1=1
and d.menu_cd_path like '%' || #{PRNT_MENU_CD} || '%'
and d.menu_kind = #{MENU_KIND}
order by d.ord asc
